attributes.action: Use  his influence to Make The Three Legged Race, The Sack Race, The Egg and Spoon Race an olympic sport for the 2012 London Olympics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Three Legged Race, The Sack Race, and The Egg and Spoon Race are all
traditional sports. These traditional sporting activities are all part of our heritage and actively attended at every school sports dayand should be included in the Olympic games. The Government should use all its influence to ensure that these games are included in the 2012 Olympics

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
